fields.label: Paragraphs Font
fields.name: text_font_family
fields.instructions: Change paragraphs font family. Default is 'Roboto'.

fields.label: Primary Font
fields.name: primary_font_family
fields.instructions: Change Primary font family. Default is 'Yeseva One'.

fields.label: Header Layout
fields.name: header_layout
fields.instructions: If you select Default - you can use this options page to configure it. If you select Builder go to Theme Templates -> Selected Template -> Edit with Elementor to configure it.

fields.label: Logo Size (Desktop)
fields.name: header_logo_size
fields.instructions: Logo size in px. Default is 150px

fields.label: Logo Size (Mobile)
fields.name: header_logo_size_mob
fields.instructions: Logo size in px. Default is 150px

fields.label: Footer Layout
fields.name: footer_layout
fields.instructions: If you select Default - you can use this options page to configure it. If you select Builder go to Theme Templates -> Selected Template -> Edit with Elementor to configure it.

sub_fields.label: Icon Class
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Icon class. All classes you can find here - https://fontawesome.com/v4.7.0/icons/

fields.label: Disable post excerpt?
fields.name: blog_excerpt
fields.instructions: Disable excerpt of post on blog page

fields.label: Social Share
fields.name: social_share
fields.instructions: Share buttons on portfolio and blog single pages

fields.label: Content
fields.name: p404_content
fields.default_value: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
